title: Safe Space Ep 32: Dying Laughing With Directors Paul Toogood and Lord Lloyd Stanton
description:
Thank you so much for tuning into another episode of Safe Space with Sam Tripoli. I know this typically is a Rant podcast but the last two episode I've done it a little different. Last episode with my old man, Big Sam, and this episode I interview the directors of the movie Dying Laughing, Paul Toogood and Lloyd Stanton! On this episode we discuss...
1) The Art of Rap
2) The Movie Dying Laughing
3) My set last night at the LA Comedy Club
4) Why we love Stand Up Comedy
I hope you enjoy this amazing episode with two wonderful artist who I own so much too. Thank yo so much for all your support.
